svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - April 22 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
April 22, 2023" date: "2023-04-21"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
• A list of what exactly might make it into Dencun besides 4844 (protodankscaling). Discussion at the
next call on April 27
A list of what exactly might make it into Dencun besides 4844 (protodankscaling). Discussion at the
• Latest consensus layer devs call . Notes from Christine Kim EIP4788 (expose CL state in EL) likely
included in Dencun 4844 devnet5 next week discussion of long-lived subnets to reduce bandwidth use
Latest consensus layer devs call . Notes from Christine Kim
• EIP4788 (expose CL state in EL) likely included in Dencun
EIP4788 (expose CL state in EL) likely included in Dencun
• 4844 devnet5 next week
4844 devnet5 next week
• discussion of long-lived subnets to reduce bandwidth use
discussion of long-lived subnets to reduce bandwidth use
• Latest 4844 implementor call
Latest 4844 implementor call
• KZG ceremony is open again for public contributions, but your Eth account needs over 128 mainnet
transactions. If the waiting list declines, then the threshold will be reduced. Follow @carlbeek to
find out if threshold is reduced
KZG ceremony is open again for public contributions, but your Eth account needs over 128 mainnet
Layer 1
• Four options for transitioning to Verkle trees would look like
Four options for transitioning to Verkle trees would look like
• Two slots proposer builder separation with unconditional payment
Two slots proposer builder separation with unconditional payment
• Paprika , Nethermind’s experimental storage abstraction of Patricia tree
Paprika , Nethermind’s experimental storage abstraction of Patricia tree
• Equivocation attacks in MEV-boost and ePBS
Equivocation attacks in MEV-boost and ePBS
• Optimistic relays increase validator profits and are cheaper to maintain
Optimistic relays increase validator profits and are cheaper to maintain
For Stakers
• How to track the performance of your validator
How to track the performance of your validator
• Benchmarking bandwidth consumption with Shapella (Geth and Lighthouse) finds ~20% increase
Benchmarking bandwidth consumption with Shapella (Geth and Lighthouse) finds ~20% increase
• Lighthouse v4.1 - fix excessive CPU usage
Lighthouse v4.1 - fix excessive CPU usage
Geth v.1.11.6
• Rocketpool Atlas upgrade live, allows staking with 8 ETH and triples Rocketpool’s capacity
Rocketpool Atlas upgrade live, allows staking with 8 ETH and triples Rocketpool’s capacity
• How to start running a distributed validator with Obol
How to start running a distributed validator with Obol
Layer 2
• Client diversity coming with Optimism’s Bedrock upgrade: Magi, a16z’s Optimism client in rust
OP-Erigon , a fork of Erigon for Optimism
• Magi, a16z’s Optimism client in rust
Magi, a16z’s Optimism client in rust
• OP-Erigon , a fork of Erigon for Optimism
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs: EIP6888 : EVM math checking EIP6913 : SETCODE instruction EIP6914 : Reuse withdrawn validator
indices
EIPs:
• EIP6888 : EVM math checking
EIP6888 : EVM math checking
• EIP6913 : SETCODE instruction
EIP6913 : SETCODE instruction
• EIP6914 : Reuse withdrawn validator indices
EIP6914 : Reuse withdrawn validator indices
• ERCs: ERC6882 : sharable interface for borrowing ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens Derived from
Origin NFTs ERC6916 : Automatic reset of testnet ERC6912 : Versioned TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs ERC6909
: simplified alternative to erc1155 ERC6900 : modular smart contracts
ERCs:
• ERC6882 : sharable interface for borrowing
ERC6882 : sharable interface for borrowing
• ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens Derived from Origin NFTs
ERC6884 : Extendable Utility Tokens Derived from Origin NFTs
• ERC6916 : Automatic reset of testnet
ERC6916 : Automatic reset of testnet
• ERC6912 : Versioned TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs
ERC6912 : Versioned TokenIDs for Dynamic NFTs
• ERC6909 : simplified alternative to erc1155
ERC6909 : simplified alternative to erc1155
• ERC6900 : modular smart contracts
ERC6900 : modular smart contracts
This newsletter is made possible thanks to the funding received from Optimism’s RetroPGF !
Thank you to Optimism’s RetroPGF round 2 which generously funded Week in Ethereum News for “months,
not weeks.”
Stuff for developers
• viem v0.3.x , bugfixes and ethcall batch aggregation
viem v0.3.x , bugfixes and ethcall batch aggregation
• wagmi’s plan for migrating to viem
wagmi’s plan for migrating to viem
• Diamond standard in Foundry
Diamond standard in Foundry

Security
• Hundred hacked for 7.4m on Optimism, due to poorly deployed fork of compound v2
Ecosystem
• Scaffold-eth v2 hackathon winners
Scaffold-eth v2 hackathon winners
• ETH Tokyo winners
ETH Tokyo winners
• Gas prices highest this week since the Merge (ie ~80 gwei during UTC day and ~35 gwei during UTC
night) lead to over 100k burned since the Merge
Gas prices highest this week since the Merge (ie ~80 gwei during UTC day and ~35 gwei during UTC
• Devconnect announced in Istanbul for November 13-19
Devconnect announced in Istanbul for November 13-19
Enterprise
• Société Générale launches Euro stablecoin on mainnet
Notable at app layer
• Kwenta launches SmartMargin and currently has 3 different rewards programs for traders
Kwenta launches SmartMargin and currently has 3 different rewards programs for traders
• Use an onchain NFT as your Uniswap frontend
Use an onchain NFT as your Uniswap frontend

Brantly Millegan’s proposal for an onchain follow protocol

Who is delegating to you in DAOs ?
• Ameen announces Hai , multi-collateral Rai fork on optimism
Ameen announces Hai , multi-collateral Rai fork on optimism

Alchemix self-repaying .eth domains

State of zk-apps in Ethereum

Job Listings
• Snr React Native UI Dev at Status: All jobs
Snr React Native UI Dev at Status: All jobs
• Solidity team are looking for a highly skilled Dev Advocate
Solidity team are looking for a highly skilled Dev Advocate
• EF Ecosystem Support Program seek a Grant Analyst & Liaison
EF Ecosystem Support Program seek a Grant Analyst & Liaison
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
• Coinbase licensed in Bermuda to launch derivatives exchange
Coinbase licensed in Bermuda to launch derivatives exchange
• Gensler repeatedly refuses to say ETH is not a security , even though in 2018 he recognized that ETH
was not a security
Gensler repeatedly refuses to say ETH is not a security , even though in 2018 he recognized that ETH
• SEC labels Algorand an unregistered security in complaint against Bittrex. In 2019, Gary Gensler
caught on tape pumping Algorand
SEC labels Algorand an unregistered security in complaint against Bittrex.
• In 2019, Gary Gensler caught on tape pumping Algorand
• Gary Gensler’s contradiction in the middle
Gary Gensler’s contradiction in the middle
• Europe votes for uniform legal framework for EU crypto markets
Europe votes for uniform legal framework for EU crypto markets
• Next week Alex Pertsev to be released to house arrest to prepare for June trial
Next week Alex Pertsev to be released to house arrest to prepare for June trial
General/crypto
• Poseidon and Grobner basis attacks
Poseidon and Grobner basis attacks
• Consensys reports data leak of Metamask support tickets
Consensys reports data leak of Metamask support tickets
• Tayvano on a mysterious wallet drainer , where there is no common thread between compromised keys
Tayvano on a mysterious wallet drainer , where there is no common thread between compromised keys
• If you haven’t yet, make sure your iPhone and iOS are up to date
If you haven’t yet, make sure your iPhone and iOS are up to date
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-april-22-2023/
